mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basket(count, midx, gidx) VALUES (#{count}, #{midx}, #{goods.idx})
mapper.select: select basket.midx, basket.count, basket.id, goods.id as gidx, goods.name, goods.title, goods.price,goods.photo from basket join goods on goods.id = basket.gidx where midx = #{midx} and gidx = #{gidx}
select id, midx, gidx, count, name, (count * price) as price, photo from basket natural join goods where midx = #{midx} order by gidx
select sum(count * price) as total from basket natural join goods where midx = #{midx}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(price * count), 0) money FROM basket b, goods g WHERE b.id = g.id AND midx = #{memberIdx}
